job_tasks.phrase: webdevelopment sneller kan en draait om slim samenwerken met AI
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes using AI to speed up web development, which falls under building applications.

job_tasks.phrase: we snel en effectief digitale oplossingen te bouwen
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation of digital solutions, a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: concreet applicaties afleveren met cutting-edge GenAI-tools
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on delivering applications using specific tools aligns with software development.
This clearly states the task of building web applications.

job_tasks.phrase: gebruikt AI-code editors (Cursor AI, Claude Code) om sneller en slimmer te werken aan frontend en backend van onze applicaties
job_tasks.justification: The use of editors and working on frontend/backend indicates software development activities.
These are steps involved in the software development lifecycle, from coding to deployment.
Creating prototypes is a common software development task, especially in an innovative context.

job_tasks.phrase: experimenteert dagelijks met nieuwe ideeën en brengt ze direct tot leven
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'bringing ideas to life' in this context implies using generative AI to create new functionalities or applications, which touches upon model application.

job_tasks.phrase: integratie van voice-API's, AI-gestuurde chatbots en slimme automatiseringen
job_tasks.justification: Integrating APIs and building chatbots are typical software development tasks, enhanced by AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij vertaalt concepten naar concrete oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: Translating concepts into solutions implies understanding business needs and turning them into technical deliverables.

job_tasks.phrase: ondersteund door AI, en werkt nauw samen met designers en het productteam om digitale producten beter te maken
job_tasks.justification: Working with product teams to improve digital products is part of the software development process and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: activeert de nieuwste ontwikkelingen rondom AI-tools
job_tasks.justification: While not strictly data engineering, staying updated on AI tools is foundational to their application in development, which can involve understanding data aspects of these tools.

job_tasks.phrase: activeert met AI in je workflow
job_tasks.justification: Actively experimenting with AI in a workflow is about applying AI to development tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: geen klassieke developer, maar iemand die AI-tools optimaal inzet
volgt actief de nieuwste ontwikkelingen rondom AI-tools
werkt nauw samen met designers en het productteam
communiceert helder met collega's en stakeholders

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and delivering web applications using cutting-edge GenAI tools like Claude Code, Manus AI, and Cursor AI. It focuses on prompt engineering, rapid prototyping, and integration of AI features, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
